remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中的 "cache-extension" 指令。This property represents the "cache-extension" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response.

summary.span: 充当 对象的哈希函数。

span.span: Serves as a hash function for a object.
A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希代码是在相等测试期间用于标识对象的数字值。A hash code is a numeric value that is used to identify an object during equality testing. 它还可用作集合中对象的索引。It can also serve as an index for an object in a collection. 方法适合在哈希算法和数据结构（如哈希表）中使用。The method is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

summary.span: HTTP 客户端愿意接受响应的最长时间（秒）。

span.span: The maximum age, specified in seconds, that the HTTP client is willing to accept a response.
The time in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中的 "最长期限" 指令。This property represents the "max-age" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 如果 还未设置该属性，则客户端不愿意接受过时的响应。Unless the property is also set, the client is not willing to accept a stale response.

summary.span: 是否一个 HTTP 客户端愿意接受一个已超出其过期时间的响应。

span.span: Whether an HTTP client is willing to accept a response that has exceeded its expiration time.

value.span: 如果 HTTP 客户端愿意接受一个已超出其过期时间的响应，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the HTTP client is willing to accept a response that has exceed the expiration time; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 HTTP 请求的缓存控制标头字段中是否存在 "最长过时" 指令。This property represents if the "max-stale" directive is present in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MaxStaleLimit As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> MaxStaleLimit { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };
member this.MaxStaleLimit : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

summary.span: HTTP 客户端愿意接受已超出其过期时间的响应的最大时间值（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The maximum time, in seconds, an HTTP client is willing to accept a response that has exceeded its expiration time.
The time in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示分配给 HTTP 请求的缓存控制标头字段中的 "最大过时" 指令的值。This property represents the value assigned to "max-stale" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request. 如果为该 属性分配一个非零值，则客户端愿意接受已超出其过期时间的响应，但不超过指定的秒数。If the property is assigned a value other than zero, then the client is willing to accept a response that has exceeded its expiration time by no more than the specified number of seconds. 如果将零的值分配给该 属性，则客户端愿意接受过时的任何期限的响应。If a value of zero is assigned to the property, then the client is willing to accept a stale response of any age.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MinFresh As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> MinFresh { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };
member this.MinFresh : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

summary.span: HTTP 客户端愿意接受响应的新鲜度时长（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The freshness lifetime, in seconds, that an HTTP client is willing to accept a response.
The time in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 HTTP 请求的缓存控制标头字段中的 "最小值" 指令。This property represents the "min-fresh" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request. 属性指示 HTTP 客户端愿意接受其新鲜度生存期不小于其当前生存期加上新鲜度生存期指定时间（以秒为单位）的响应。The property indicates that the HTTP client is willing to accept a response whose freshness lifetime is no less than its current age plus the freshness lifetime specified time in seconds. 客户端需要响应，该响应将始终保持最新状态，并使其保持最新状态。The client wants a response that will still be fresh for at least the current age plus the freshness lifetime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中的 "必须重新验证" 指令。This property represents the "must-revalidate" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP response.

summary.span: HTTP 客户端是否愿意接受缓存的响应。

span.span: Whether an HTTP client is willing to accept a cached response.

value.span: 如果 HTTP 客户端不愿意接受缓存的响应，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if the HTTP client is not willing to accept a cached response; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中的 "不缓存" 指令。This property represents the "no-cache" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 当 属性设置为 `true` 在 HTTP 请求消息中提供时，应用程序应将请求转发到源服务器，即使它具有正在请求的内容的缓存副本。When the property is set to `true` present in a HTTP request message, an application should forward the request toward the origin server even if it has a cached copy of what is being requested.

span.span: A collection of fieldnames in the "no-cache" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP response.
A collection of fieldnames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中的 "不缓存" 指令中的字段名。This property represents fieldnames in the "no-cache" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP response.

member this.NoStore : bool with get, set

summary.span: 缓存是否不得存储 HTTP 请求消息或任何响应的任何部分。

span.span: Whether a cache must not store any part of either the HTTP request message or any response.

value.span: 如果缓存不能存储 HTTP 请求消息或任何响应的任何部分，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if a cache must not store any part of either the HTTP request message or any response; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中的 "不存储" 指令。This property represents the "no-store" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 属性的目的 是防止无意中释放或保留敏感信息。The purpose of the property is to prevent the inadvertent release or retention of sensitive information. 此属性应用于整个消息，可以在 HTTP 请求或响应中发送。This property applies to the entire message, and may be sent either in an HTTP request or a response.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NoTransform { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.NoTransform : bool with get, set

summary.span: 缓存或代理是否不能更改实体正文的任何方面。

span.span: Whether a cache or proxy must not change any aspect of the entity-body.

value.span: 如果缓存或代理不能更改实体正文的任何方面，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a cache or proxy must not change any aspect of the entity-body; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示 HTTP 请求或 HTTP 响应的缓存控制标头字段中的 "无转换" 指令。This property represents the "no-transform" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 当 设置为时 `true` ，中间缓存或代理不能更改实体正文的任何方面。When the is set to `true`, intermediate caches or proxies must not change any aspect of the entity body. 中间缓存和代理的实现者发现转换某些实体正文的媒体类型很有用。Implementors of intermediate caches and proxies have found it useful to convert the media type of certain entity bodies. 例如，在图像格式之间进行转换以节省缓存空间或减少慢速链接上的流量时，不透明的代理可能。A non-transparent proxy might, for example, convert between image formats in order to save cache space or to reduce the amount of traffic on a slow link. 但是，如果将这些转换应用于适用于某些类型的应用程序的实体正文，则会出现严重的操作问题。Serious operational problems occur, however, when these transformations are applied to entity bodies intended for certain kinds of applications.
